title: JKSSB JE (Civil) Focused Assessment: Water Supply & Distribution Systems
description: This professional practice test is meticulously designed for aspirants of the JKSSB Junior Engineer (Civil) recruitment examination. It provides a comprehensive assessment of key topics within Water Supply and Waste Water Engineering, specifically focusing on the Conveyance of Water, Laying out of Pipes, Building Water Supply, and Water Supply Fixtures & Installation. The questions are benchmarked to an undergraduate engineering level, reflecting the standards and patterns of the JKSSB exam. This assessment features a balanced mix of practical, application-based problems and core conceptual questions to thoroughly evaluate your understanding and readiness.
topics: Conveyance of water — Water Supply and Waste Water Engineering
Laying out of pipes — Water Supply and Waste Water Engineering
Building water supply — Water Supply and Waste Water Engineering
Water supply fixtures and installation — Water Supply and Waste Water Engineering
